Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Provides for cancellation of continuous services
Summary: Requires businesses that make an automatic renewal offer or continuous service offer to provide a link on any public website it maintains for cancellation of such service.
LawCode: Amd ยง527-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to cancellation of continuous services
